name: Moai Makeover
description:
R - reset

Click and drag iron shavings with the wand. Experience the power of magnets like never before. How do they work?

Made over the weekend as part of Northeastern University's Game Development Club October Game Jam

Programming: Ash Sullivan (@rainbowrhapsody; ashsullivan.com)

Music: Brian Mowat (@OnePennyLess; https://soundcloud.com/brian-mowat)

Moai head: http://downloads.bbc.co.uk/rmhttp/schools/primaryhistory/images/worldhistory/easter_island/easter-island_statue_close.jpg
